LanguageData.SplitDirt.label: separate dirt
LanguageData.SplitDirt.description: Separates 1 dirt into 1 sand and 1 clay.
LanguageData.SplitDirtBulk.label: separate dirt in bulk
LanguageData.SplitDirtBulk.description: Separates 5 dirt into 5 sand and 5 clay.
LanguageData.DirtToClay.label: grind dirt to clay
LanguageData.DirtToClayBulk.label: grind dirt to clay in bulk
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocks.label: crush stone chunk
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocks.description: Break a stone chunk into 2 crushed rocks.
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocksBulk.label: crush stone chunks in bulk
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocksBulk.description: Break 5 stone chunks into 10 crushed rocks.
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocksBlock.label: crush stone blocks
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocksBlock.description: Break 10 stone blocks into crushed rocks.
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocksBlockBulk.label: crush stone blocks in bulk
LanguageData.MakeCrushedRocksBlockBulk.description: Break 100 stone blocks into 10 crushed rocks.
LanguageData.MakeSand.label: grind rocks into sand
LanguageData.MakeSand.description: Grind up crushed rocks to create 1 sand.
LanguageData.MakeSandBulk.label: grind rocks into sand in bulk
LanguageData.MakeSandBulk.description: Grind up 5 crushed rocks to create 5 sand.
LanguageData.MakeClay.label: grind sand into clay
LanguageData.MakeClay.description: Grind 1 sand into finer particles to create 1 clay.
LanguageData.MakeClayBulk.label: grind sand into clay in bulk
LanguageData.MakeClayBulk.description: Grind 5 sand into finer particles to create 5 clay.
LanguageData.MakeDirt.label: create dirt
LanguageData.MakeDirt.description: Create 2 dirt from 1 sand, 1 clay, and 1 fertilizer.
LanguageData.MakeDirtBulk.label: create dirt in bulk
LanguageData.MakeDirtBulk.description: Create 10 dirt from 5 sand, 5 clay, and 5 fertilizer.
LanguageData.MakeCompost.label: make raw compost
LanguageData.MakeCompost.description: Make raw compost from organic waste (raw meat and plants).
LanguageData.MakeCompost5.label: make 5 raw compost
LanguageData.MakeCompost5.description: Make raw compost from organic waste (raw meat and plants).
LanguageData.CompostCorpse.label: burn corpse for compost
LanguageData.CompostCorpseCampfire.label: burn corpse for compost
LanguageData.CompostCorpseCampfire.description: Cremate a corpse into compost. Less efficient than doing so in a crematorium.
LanguageData.MakeBricks.label: make 12 bricks
LanguageData.MakeBricks.description: Mold and fire clay to make bricks.
LanguageData.MakeFastBricks.label: make 24 bricks
LanguageData.MakeFastBricks.description: Mold and fire clay to make bricks.
